name: Mini Pool Billiard
description:
This is a classic simplified version of pool game, it's very suitable for all Family, the game play is very simple fun and addictive, try to put all balls in the holes!

Product feature bullets:
• Realistic pool ball physics
• Endless gameplay
• Intuitive touch controls
• Five different billiards tables
• Five different Music Themes
• Great graphics and sounds

Have fun with this great game!
